parameters.name: Keyword
parameters.description: The keyword that you use for query. Exact match is supported by instance ID or instance name.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description: The language in which you want the values of some response parameters to be returned. These response parameters support multiple languages.

parameters.name: NeedDetailAttributes
parameters.description: Specifies whether additional information is required. Default value: **false**.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return per page.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group.
